bot_meta.name: ZRA Assistant
bot_meta.description: Chatbot answering in English, Bemba, Lozi, and Nyanja regarding ZRA and Smart Invoice (Practice Note No. 1 of 2025).

responses: Hello, welcome to the Zambia Revenue Authority virtual assistant. How can you be helped today?
Welcome to the ZRA assistant. Ask anything about tax changes for 2025, Smart Invoice, VAT or other ZRA services.
Mulishani, mwaiseni ku Zambia Revenue Authority virtual assistant. Ungafwa ifyo nafwa ifyo lelo?
Mwaiseni ku ZRA assistant. Funda ilibantu ifitile ku tax changes ya 2025, Smart Invoice, VAT na ifilomboshi fyi ZRA.
Ndi bwino, ngaiwe? Mwaiseni mukwai.
Natotela. Kuti namwafwa shani lelo?
Cawama. Kuti namwafwa shani na ZRA?
Natotela. Mungepusha pa Smart Invoice nangu imisonkho.
Ndili bwino, kaya inu? Zikomo.
Ndili bwino. Mungafunse za misonkho kapena Smart Invoice.
Zikomo. Mungafunse za misonkho kapena Smart Invoice.
Chabwino. Ndingakuthandizeni bwanji lero?
Ndililabotu. Mwapona buti?
Ndililabotu. Ingamugwasya buti sunu?
Kabotu. Ingamugwasya buti sunu?
Zikomo. Amubuzye zya Smart Invoice.
Na pila hande, wena u pila cwang?
Ni itumezi. Mutozi cwani?
Ni itumezi. Mwakona kubuza za Smart Invoice kapa mitelo.
Hande. Mwakona kubuza za ZRA.

This assistant provides general guidance on recent Zambian tax changes for 2025, including income tax, VAT, Smart Invoice requirements, turnover tax, mobile money levy and other topics covered in Practice Note No. 1 of 2025. It does not replace the law or official ZRA advice.

Ichi assistant chipapula amafunika yakusowa ku tax changes za Zambian za 2025, pantu income tax, VAT, Smart Invoice requirements, turnover tax, mobile money levy na ifilomboshi fyi Practice Note No. 1 ya 2025. Tachipelela law na official ZRA advice.

training_phrases: What is the Zambia Revenue Authority?
responses: ZRA is the statutory body that administers and collects taxes and related levies in Zambia, including income tax, VAT, customs and excise duties, and specific charges like the mobile money transaction levy.
ZRA ni boma body ifyo ili kukukwata na kulemeka amisonkho na related levies mu Zambia, pantu income tax, VAT, customs na excise duties, na specific charges nga mobile money transaction levy.
ZRA's mission is to optimise and sustain revenue collection and administration for a prosperous Zambia.
ZRA's vision is to be a world class model of excellence in revenue administration and trade facilitation.
The ZRA tagline is: "My Tax, Your Tax, Our Destiny".
ZRA's mission ni kukukwata na kusunga revenue collection na administration for a prosperous Zambia.
ZRA's vision ni ku ba world class model of excellence mu revenue administration na trade facilitation.
ZRA tagline ni: "My Tax, Your Tax, Our Destiny".

training_phrases: What is Practice Note No. 1 of 2025?
Which laws are covered in this practice note?
What changes are explained in Practice Note 1 2025?
responses: Practice Note No. 1 of 2025 provides general guidance on various tax changes that take effect from 1 January 2025.

It covers amendments to: the Income Tax Amendment Act No. 22 of 2024, Property Transfer Tax Amendment Act No. 27 of 2024, Value Added Tax Amendment Act No. 23 of 2024, VAT Regulations and Electronic Invoicing Regulations, Income Tax Advance Income Tax Regulations, Customs and Excise changes, Insurance Premium Levy changes, and the Mobile Money Transaction Levy Act No. 25 of 2024.
The practice note is for general guidance only and is not a legal authority, and it does not remove any person's right of appeal or ZRA's discretion under the law.

training_phrases: Practice Note No. 1 ya 2025 ni cinshi?
Imilawu ilandapo practice note ni fi?
responses: Practice Note No. 1 ya 2025 ipapula general guidance ku various tax changes ifyo zilandakala ku 1 January 2025.

Ilandapo amendments ku: Income Tax Amendment Act No. 22 ya 2024, Property Transfer Tax Amendment Act No. 27 ya 2024, Value Added Tax Amendment Act No. 23 ya 2024, VAT Regulations na Electronic Invoicing Regulations, Income Tax Advance Income Tax Regulations, Customs na Excise changes, Insurance Premium Levy changes, na Mobile Money Transaction Levy Act No. 25 ya 2024.
Ichi practice note ni for general guidance pe na si legal authority, ta kubola umunthu uwe na right of appeal na ZRA's discretion under the law.

training_phrases: What are the main tax changes effective 1 January 2025?
responses: Key changes include: Turnover tax threshold increased to K5,000,000 and rate set at 5% above K12,000 up to that limit. Property transfer tax increased to 8% on land, shares, intellectual property and exploration rights. Advance income tax introduced on certain exports and foreign remittances without a tax clearance certificate at 15%. VAT input tax restricted mainly to Smart Invoice or exempted systems.

training_phrases: Main tax changes za 1 January 2025 ni fi?
responses: Key changes ni: Turnover tax threshold yakwatishtwa ku K5,000,000 na rate yakusungwa pa 5% kupalupafye K12,000 kuti leko limit. Property transfer tax yakwatishtwa ku 8% pa land, shares, intellectual property na exploration rights. Advance income tax yakalandwa pa certain exports na foreign remittances tabula TPIN pa 15%. VAT input tax yakatiletwa Smart Invoice na exempted systems.

training_phrases: Do I need a TPIN for mobile money?
responses: A TPIN is a unique tax registration number and is now mandatory for opening and maintaining accounts with water utilities, mobile money and telecom operators, for membership with professional bodies, and for registering land title deeds, among other regulated transactions.

TPIN ni unique tax registration number ifyo lelo ni mandatory pa opening na maintaining accounts na water utilities, mobile money na telecom operators, for membership na professional bodies, na registering land title deeds, pantu ifilomboshi fyi regulated transactions.

training_phrases: How do I apply for a TPIN?
responses: You can apply: Online via the ZRA website. Through the TaxOnApp mobile application. Using the USSD code *858# on supported networks, after which your TPIN and credentials are sent to your email and phone.
Ungapoka: Online via ZRA website. Through TaxOnApp mobile application. Using USSD *858# pa supported networks, after which TPIN na credentials zipelekwa pa email na phone yako.

training_phrases: What is the ZRA e-invoicing system?
What do you mean by Smart Invoicing?
responses: Smart Invoice is the electronic invoicing system defined in the VAT framework which issues tax invoices with fiscal memory and transmits data to ZRA in real time, replacing earlier manual and some electronic fiscal device arrangements.

From 1 January 2025, only invoices issued through the electronic invoicing system (Smart Invoice) or by a taxable supplier that ZRA has exempted from using Smart Invoice can generally be used to support VAT input tax claims.

Smart Invoice ni electronic invoicing system ifyo yakusungwa mu VAT framework ifyo ilandapo tax invoices na fiscal memory na itumizha data ku ZRA mu real time, yakusunganisha earlier manual na some electronic fiscal device arrangements.
Ku 1 January 2025, only invoices yakusungwa through electronic invoicing system (Smart Invoice) na by taxable supplier ZRA yakusunganisha from using Smart Invoice zikupokela VAT input tax claims.

training_phrases: From when do the new Smart Invoice rules apply?
responses: The main Smart Invoice and VAT rules discussed in Practice Note No. 1 of 2025 apply from 1 January 2025, which is the commencement date for the relevant amendment legislation.
Main Smart Invoice na VAT rules mu Practice Note No. 1 ya 2025 zilandakala ku 1 January 2025, ifyo ni commencement date for relevant amendment legislation.

training_phrases: Can I still use manual invoices for input VAT?
Are invoices outside Smart Invoice allowed for input tax?
Which invoices qualify for input tax claims?
Do I need Smart Invoice to claim VAT?
Are any non-Smart-Invoice invoices still valid for input tax?
responses: For supplies from 1 January 2025, input VAT may generally only be claimed from invoices generated by Smart Invoice or from invoices issued by taxable suppliers formally exempted from using Smart Invoice; other manual invoices will not support input tax claims.
Yes, tax invoices issued outside Smart Invoice up to 31 December 2024 remain valid for input VAT claims in 2025 if they meet the ninety‑day claim period and all mandatory tax invoice requirements.

training_phrases: Manual invoices for input VAT zilandako?
Invoices outside Smart Invoice for input tax?
responses: For supplies ku 1 January 2025, input VAT yakupokela generally only from invoices yakusungwa by Smart Invoice na from invoices yakusungwa by taxable suppliers yakusunganishwa from using Smart Invoice; other manual invoices tazingapokela input tax claims.
Yes, tax invoices yakusungwa outside Smart Invoice up to 31 December 2024 zikupokela valid for input VAT claims mu 2025 if zipelele ninety-day claim period na all mandatory tax invoice requirements.

training_phrases: What happens when Smart Invoice is down?
How long do I have to upload manual invoices?
What if there is a system failure on the e-invoicing platform?
responses: If Smart Invoice or an approved invoicing system fails, the supplier may record transactions manually, but must upload all such transactions to the electronic invoicing system within 72 hours after the system is restored.

If Smart Invoice na approved invoicing system isaya, supplier yakupokela record transactions manually, pantu must upload all such transactions ku electronic invoicing system within 72 hours after system yakusungwa.

training_phrases: Who can be exempted from Smart Invoice?
Can ZRA allow me not to use Smart Invoice?
Can ZRA exempt a business from using Smart Invoice?
responses: The Commissioner‑General may authorise a taxable supplier to use a different approved document, device or equipment instead of Smart Invoice under prescribed conditions, and invoices issued under such exemption may still be used for input tax purposes.

Commissioner-General yakupokela authorise taxable supplier ku use different approved document, device na equipment instead of Smart Invoice under prescribed conditions, na invoices yakusungwa under such exemption zikupokela used for input tax purposes.

training_phrases: Can I transfer my approved invoicing system to another business?
responses: No, a taxable supplier that has registered an approved invoicing system for its own use may not transfer that system to another taxable supplier.
Awe, taxable supplier yakusungwa approved invoicing system for its own use takupokela transfer that system ku another taxable supplier.

training_phrases: How does Smart Invoice affect insurance premium levy?
responses: The Insurance Premium Levy amendments replace references to electronic fiscal devices with electronic invoicing systems, meaning insurers, brokers and agents must use an electronic invoicing system (such as Smart Invoice or an approved equivalent) to record insurance premiums and levy and to issue tax invoices.

Insurance Premium Levy amendments yakusunganisha references ku electronic fiscal devices na electronic invoicing systems, meaning insurers, brokers na agents must use electronic invoicing system (such as Smart Invoice na approved equivalent) ku record insurance premiums na levy na ku issue tax invoices.

training_phrases: Does Smart Invoice affect all VAT-registered suppliers?
responses: Yes, all VAT‑registered suppliers are expected to comply with Smart Invoice or an approved equivalent unless ZRA grants an exemption, and failure to use the prescribed system can invalidate invoices for input tax claims and may attract penalties.

Yes, all VAT-registered suppliers yakusungwa comply na Smart Invoice na approved equivalent unless ZRA grants exemption, na failure ku use prescribed system rikupokela invalidate invoices for input tax claims na may attract penalties.

training_phrases: Where can I get technical support on Smart Invoice?
responses: Practice Note No. 1 of 2025 directs taxpayers to ZRA’s online channels and dedicated Smart Invoice support contacts, and also advises taxpayers to contact the ZRA Call Centre or visit Customer Experience Centres for assistance.

Practice Note No. 1 ya 2025 ilandapo taxpayers ku ZRA's online channels na dedicated Smart Invoice support contacts, na advises taxpayers ku contact ZRA Call Centre na visit Customer Experience Centres for assistance.

training_phrases: What is the VAT registration threshold for 2025?
What is the VAT threshold for 2025?
Do I need to register for VAT?
What is the VAT turnover threshold?
responses: The statutory VAT registration threshold remains at K800,000 annual taxable turnover.
If your annual taxable turnover exceeds K800,000, you are required to register for VAT, subject to the normal rules.
Statutory VAT registration threshold yakusunga pa K800,000 annual taxable turnover.
If annual taxable turnover yako yakupitile K800,000, mukupokela register for VAT, subject ku normal rules.

training_phrases: What is the turnover tax threshold for 2025?
Do I qualify for turnover tax?
responses: From 2025, the maximum annual threshold for turnover tax has increased from K800,000 to K5,000,000.
For turnover between K12,000 and K5,000,000 per annum, the turnover tax rate is 5 percent.

A taxpayer with annual taxable turnover exceeding K800,000 but not exceeding K5,000,000 is required to register for both turnover tax and VAT, while above K5,000,000 they fall under income tax and VAT.
Ku 2025, maximum annual threshold for turnover tax yakwatishtwa from K800,000 ku K5,000,000.
For turnover between K12,000 na K5,000,000 per annum, turnover tax rate ni 5 percent.
Taxpayer na annual taxable turnover yakupitile K800,000 pantu takupitile K5,000,000 mukupokela register for both turnover tax na VAT, while above K5,000,000 balandapo under income tax na VAT.

training_phrases: How is the gig economy taxed?
What about online and gig workers for turnover tax?
responses: The annual turnover threshold for turnover tax for persons conducting business through the gig economy has also increased to K5,000,000.
Annual turnover threshold for turnover tax for persons conducting business through gig economy yakusungwa yakwatishtwa ku K5,000,000.

training_phrases: Who is excluded from turnover tax?
Is rental income under turnover tax?
Are mining operations on turnover tax?
responses: Partnerships, income from consultancy services, mining operations and businesses on voluntary VAT registration remain excluded from turnover tax.
The rental tax threshold remains at K800,000 and the threshold for artisanal and small‑scale mining licence holders also remains at K800,000.
Partnerships, income from consultancy services, mining operations na businesses pa voluntary VAT registration yakusunga excluded from turnover tax.
Rental tax threshold yakusunga pa K800,000 na threshold for artisanal na small-scale mining licence holders yakusunga pa K800,000.

training_phrases: What is a Tax Clearance Certificate (TCC)?
When do I need a tax clearance certificate?
Is tax clearance required for licences?
Explain the general tax clearance certificate
responses: A TCC confirms that a person or partnership has met tax obligations or agreed arrangements under laws administered by ZRA, and it is required for transactions like transfer of property, change of motor vehicle ownership, obtaining trading and mining licences, and many government permits.

Professional bodies and other regulators must also require a tax clearance certificate for registration, renewal and issuance of practising licences, except for students or applicants not carrying on related business.

TCC ikupokula umboni kuti umunthu na partnership wasungile tax obligations na agreed arrangements under laws administered by ZRA, na ikupokela for transactions nga transfer of property, change of motor vehicle ownership, obtaining trading na mining licences, na many government permits.

Professional bodies na other regulators must require tax clearance certificate for registration, renewal na issuance of practising licences, except for students na applicants takukaba carrying on related business.

training_phrases: Are there exemptions from needing a TCC?
Who is exempt from tax clearance certificate?
responses: Yes, a TCC is not required for: Students registering with regulatory institutions. Applicants not carrying on business related to the regulator. Supplies of goods and services below ZMW 200 per transaction and agricultural produce up to ZMW 10,000 per transaction.

Yes, TCC takulipelekwa for: Students registering na regulatory institutions. Applicants takukaba carrying on business related ku regulator. Supplies of goods na services below ZMW 200 per transaction na agricultural produce up to ZMW 10,000 per transaction.

training_phrases: How do I apply for a Tax Clearance Certificate online?
responses: Log into the ZRA web portal using your TPIN and password, navigate to the Compliance or Tax Clearance section, submit an application for a TCC, and once approved you can print or download the certificate from the portal.
Log into ZRA web portal using TPIN na password yako, navigate ku Compliance na Tax Clearance section, submit application for TCC, na once approved ungaprint na download certificate from portal.

training_phrases: What is Advance Income Tax (AIT) on remittances and exports?
How is AIT on exports charged?
Do I pay tax when sending money abroad?
Advance income tax on foreign payments
responses: If a taxpayer has no valid TCC, a 15% AIT is charged on: Exports of goods for commercial purposes at the port of entry. Foreign remittances above USD 2,000 (or kwacha equivalent) through a commercial bank.
This AIT is a credit against future tax, not a final tax, and can be used to offset other liabilities or be refunded if there are no liabilities.
If taxpayer tabula valid TCC, 15% AIT ikukolelwa pa: Exports of goods for commercial purposes pa port of entry. Foreign remittances above USD 2,000 (na kwacha equivalent) through commercial bank.
Ichi AIT ni credit against future tax, si final tax, na ikupokela used ku offset other liabilities na be refunded if tabuli liabilities.

training_phrases: What is the Mobile Money Transaction Levy?
responses: The Mobile Money Transaction Levy Act No. 25 of 2024 imposes a levy on payment or transfer of electronic money from one person to another, and it is administered by ZRA.
Mobile money service providers must collect the levy, submit returns, remit the levies to ZRA by the due date, and keep records of their operations, with penalties for non‑compliance.

training_phrases: Mobile Money Transaction Levy ni cinshi?
responses: Mobile Money Transaction Levy Act No. 25 ya 2024 ikukolela levy pa payment na transfer of electronic money from one person ku another, na ikukolelwa by ZRA.
Mobile money service providers must collect levy, submit returns, remit levies ku ZRA by due date, na keep records of operations, na penalties for non-compliance.

training_phrases: What income is taxable under PAYE?
responses: Pay As You Earn (PAYE) is the system under which employers deduct income tax from employees' emoluments using monthly tax bands for each charge year.

Taxable emoluments include monthly salary, commutation of accrued leave days and accrued service bonuses, while certain payments like pension benefits, redundancy pay and medical expenses paid by the employer may be exempt.
Pay As You Earn (PAYE) ni system under which employers deduct income tax from employees' emoluments using monthly tax bands for each charge year.

Taxable emoluments include monthly salary, commutation of accrued leave days na accrued service bonuses, while certain payments nga pension benefits, redundancy pay na medical expenses paid by employer may be exempt.

training_phrases: Is there a tax credit for persons with disabilities?
How much is the disability credit?
responses: An employee registered with the Zambia Agency for Persons with Disabilities is entitled to a disability tax credit of K7,200 per annum, which is K600 per month.
The employer should apply this credit when computing PAYE so that the employee's monthly tax payable is reduced by the credit amount.
Employee yakusungwa na Zambia Agency for Persons with Disabilities entitled ku disability tax credit of K7,200 per annum, ifyo K600 per month.
Employer should apply ichi credit when computing PAYE so kuti employee's monthly tax payable ikapungule by credit amount.

training_phrases: How do I get a PAYE refund?
responses: PAYE is generally non‑refundable, but a refund may arise where tax has been overcharged in a charge year, for example due to payroll errors, use of wrong tax bands, or taxation of exempt income.

A refund can also arise if an employee stops work during the year or makes eligible deductions such as donations to an approved Public Benefit Organisation, subject to the 15 percent limit of taxable income.
PAYE generally non-refundable, pantu refund may arise where tax yakukolelwa over mu charge year, for example due ku payroll errors, use of wrong tax bands, na taxation of exempt income.
Refund rikupokela arise if employee astop work during year na makes eligible deductions such as donations ku approved Public Benefit Organisation, subject ku 15 percent limit of taxable income.

training_phrases: What is the property transfer tax rate in 2025?
PTT rate on land and shares
How much PTT do I pay?
responses: From 1 January 2025, the property transfer tax rate is 8 percent of realised value on land, shares, intellectual property and mining rights for exploration licences.
Certain other mining rights, such as mining licences and mineral processing licences, attract PTT at 10 percent of the realised value.
Ku 1 January 2025, property transfer tax rate ni 8 percent of realised value pa land, shares, intellectual property na mining rights for exploration licences.
Certain other mining rights, such as mining licences na mineral processing licences, attract PTT pa 10 percent of realised value.

training_phrases: What is reverse VAT on imported services?
Do I pay VAT on imported services?
responses: Reverse VAT applies where a taxable supplier in Zambia imports taxable services from a foreign supplier that fall within the scope of VAT, and the Zambian recipient accounts for VAT instead of the foreign supplier.
Importation of exempt services by a taxable supplier, or importation by a person who makes exempt supplies or is not required to register, is outside the scope of reverse VAT.

Reverse VAT ikukolela where taxable supplier mu Zambia imports taxable services from foreign supplier ifyo zilandapo mu scope of VAT, na Zambian recipient accounts for VAT instead of foreign supplier.
Importation of exempt services by taxable supplier, na importation by person yakukaba makes exempt supplies na si required ku register, outside scope of reverse VAT.

training_phrases: How can I contact ZRA for help?
Where can I get more help?
Who do I talk to for clarification?
responses: You can contact the ZRA National Call Centre, visit the nearest Customer Experience Centre or other ZRA offices, and use the official website for contact numbers, service information and practice notes.
The practice note emphasises that detailed or disputed matters should be taken up directly with ZRA and that taxpayers retain their right of appeal on tax liability issues.
Ungafunga ZRA National Call Centre, visit nearest Customer Experience Centre na other ZRA offices, na use official website for contact numbers, service information na practice notes.
Practice note ikusunganisha kuti detailed na disputed matters be taken up directly na ZRA na kuti taxpayers retain right of appeal pa tax liability issues.
Lumela, utamboke ku Zambia Revenue Authority virtual assistant. Ninga ku gwase buti luno?
Mlumeleng, iyi ni ZRA assistant. Buuza buti ka mitelo ya 2025, Smart Invoice, VAT kana minwe ya ZRA.
Na pila hande, wena u pila cwang?
Ni itumezi, mutozi chwani luno?
Kozo, ni hande. Ninga ku gwase buti ka ZRA luno?
Ni itumezi. Buuza buti ka Smart Invoice kana mitelo.

Assistant ye yi pelela manyalo ka mitelo ye shanguluka mu Zambia ka 2025, ki mitelo ya malgashi (income tax), VAT, Smart Invoice, turnover tax, mobile money levy ni minwe, ho ya ka Practice Note No. 1 ya 2025. A si mulayo, bantu ba sa shuwa ku kopa manyalo ka ZRA ka bo ndate ba mitelo.

training_phrases: ZRA mulimo wa bone ni yini?
responses: ZRA ki bulukani ya mmuso ye i bokang ni ku fumanya mitelo ni mabeli a yone mu Zambia, ho akarelwa income tax, VAT, customs ni excise duties ni mabeli a ma transaction ya mobile money.

training_phrases: ZRA ba lakanya cinwi mu bulao?
responses: Mission ya ZRA ki ku ntumisa ni ku tswaleletsa kupila mitelo ni malango a yone ho u sila Zambia ye lipile hande.
Vision ya ZRA ki ku ba muenzelo wa boloka mu kupila mitelo ni ho ntumisa bohema.
Tagline ya ZRA ki: "My Tax, Your Tax, Our Destiny".

training_phrases: Practice Note No. 1 ya 2025 ni yini?
Mamulayo afe a katelwa mu practice note?
Mushintuko afe a hlaloswa mu Practice Note 1 2025?
Practice Note 2025 e bua ka cinwi?
responses: Practice Note No. 1 ya 2025 yi pelela manyalo ka mushintuko wa mitelo ye ya kala ho qala ka 1 January 2025.

Yi akarelwa mushintuko mu Income Tax Amendment Act No. 22 ya 2024, Property Transfer Tax Amendment Act No. 27 ya 2024, Value Added Tax Amendment Act No. 23 ya 2024, VAT Regulations ni Electronic Invoicing Regulations, Income Tax Advance Income Tax Regulations, le mushintuko mu Customs ni Excise, Insurance Premium Levy, ni Mobile Money Transaction Levy Act No. 25 ya 2024.
Practice note ye ni manyalo fela, a si mulayo, a ni ko hlolelela tokelo ya motho ya ku ipela ni tokelo ya ZRA ya ku itela ditumelo ka mulayo.

training_phrases: Mushintuko wa mitelo wa 1 January 2025 ni yini?
responses: Mushintuko wa bohlokwa: Turnover tax threshold u kwatilela ku K5,000,000 ni rate ya 5% ho tloha holimo K12,000 ho ya ho limit. Property transfer tax u kwatilela ku 8% ho mobu, shares, intellectual property le exploration rights. Advance income tax ya 15% e ho exports le foreign remittances ho sena tax clearance certificate. VAT input tax ka kakonyana e hulwa fela ka Smart Invoice kana suppliers ba lokolotsweng ho Smart Invoice.

training_phrases: Na ke nyaka TPIN ho mobile money?
responses: TPIN ki nomoro ya ku ngodisa mitelo ye iketeng ya motho, ye luno e hlokahala ho bula le ho tswaleletsa account le water utilities, mobile money le ba telecommunication, ho ngodisa ka professional bodies le ho ngodisa title deeds ya mobu, le ditransaction tse dingwe tse di lawiloeng.
U ka kopa TPIN online ka website ya ZRA, ka TaxOnApp mobile application, kana ka USSD *858# ho dinetwork tse di tshegetsang, ho fela TPIN le ditlhaka tsa hao di romelelwa ka email le ka phone.

Smart Invoice ki electronic invoicing system ye e hlalositswe mu VAT framework, e hlahisa tax invoice le fiscal memory le ho romela data ka nako ya hona jwale ku ZRA, ho nkela manual invoices le diofisi tse dingwe tsa fiscal sebaka.
Ho tloha ka 1 January 2025, VAT input tax ka kakonyana e tla hulwa fela ka invoices tse tswang mu Smart Invoice kana ho taxable supplier ye ZRA e ba lokolotseng ho Smart Invoice.

training_phrases: Smart Invoice rules di qala lini?
responses: Main Smart Invoice le VAT rules mu Practice Note No. 1 ya 2025 di qala ho sebetsa ka 1 January 2025, ho latela molao wa mushintuko.

training_phrases: Na nka sa sebedisa manual invoices ho input VAT?
Invoices tsa ka ntle ho Smart Invoice di a amoheleha?
Ke dife invoices tse di tshwanetseng ho input tax claims?
Na ke nyaka Smart Invoice ho claim VAT?
Non-Smart-Invoice invoices di ntse di valid?
responses: Ho tloha ka 1 January 2025, input VAT ka kakonyana e tla hulwa fela ka invoices tse hlahiswang ke Smart Invoice kana invoices tsa suppliers ba lokolotsweng ho Smart Invoice; manual invoices tse dingwe a di sa ka tšehetsa input tax claims.

Invoices tsa tax tsa ka ntle ho Smart Invoice ho fihla ka 31 December 2024 di sa ntse di ka sebeliswa ho input VAT claims mu 2025 hoba di fihleletse ninety-day claim period le ditlhokego tsohle tsa tax invoice.

training_phrases: Ho etsahala cinwi ha Smart Invoice e wa?
Ke nale nako e kae ho upload manual invoices?
responses: Ha Smart Invoice kana approved invoicing system e na le problem, supplier a ka ngola ditransaction ka letsoho, empa o tshwanetse ho upload transaction tseo kaofela ku electronic invoicing system mu 72 hours kamora system ho lokiswa.

training_phrases: Ke mang a ka lokolwang ho Smart Invoice?
Na ZRA e ka ntshwarela ho sa sebedise Smart Invoice?
ZRA e ka lokolla business ho Smart Invoice?
responses: Commissioner-General a ka dumela taxable supplier ho sebedisa document, device kana equipment ye nngwe e amogelwang sebakeng sa Smart Invoice ka conditions tse behilweng, mme invoices tse hlahiswang ka tsela ye di sa ntse di ka sebediswa ho input tax.

training_phrases: Na nka fetisetsa approved invoicing system ho business ye nngwe?
responses: Awa, taxable supplier ye e ngodisitseng approved invoicing system bakeng sa yona a ka se e fetisetse ho supplier ye nngwe.

training_phrases: Smart Invoice e ama insurance premium levy buti?
responses: Mushintuko mu Insurance Premium Levy o nkile mantsoe a electronic fiscal devices wa a tlotla ka electronic invoicing systems, ho bolelang gore ba insurance, brokers le agents ba tshwanetse ho sebedisa electronic invoicing system (Smart Invoice kana e tshwanang) ho ngodisa insurance premiums le levy le ho hlahisa tax invoices.

training_phrases: Na Smart Invoice e ama VAT-registered suppliers bohle?
Ke mang a tshwanetseng ho sebedisa Smart Invoice?
responses: Eeh, VAT-registered suppliers bohle ba tshwanetse ho latela Smart Invoice kana system e tshwanang le yona ntle le he ZRA e ba file exemption; ho hloka ho sebedisa system ye e laetsweng ho ka etsa gore invoices di se amohelwe ho input tax le ho tlisa dipenaliti.

training_phrases: Support ya technical ho Smart Invoice e fumaneha kae?
responses: Practice Note No. 1 ya 2025 e supa taxpayers ho ZRA online channels le Smart Invoice support contacts, gape e eletsa gore ba iteanye le ZRA Call Centre kapa ba etele Customer Experience Centres ho kopa thuso.

training_phrases: Do I need to register for VAT?
responses: Statutory VAT registration threshold e sa ntse e le K800,000 ya annual taxable turnover.
Ha turnover ya hao ya selemo e feta K800,000, o tshwanetse ho ngodisa VAT tlas'a melao e tlwaelehileng.
Ho tloha 2025, maximum annual threshold bakeng sa turnover tax e nyolohetse ho tloha K800,000 ho ea ho K5,000,000.
Bakeng sa turnover pakeng tsa K12,000 le K5,000,000 ka selemo, turnover tax rate ke 5 percent.
Taxpayer ya nang le annual taxable turnover e fetang K800,000 empa e sa fete K5,000,000 o tshwanetse ho ngodisa both turnover tax le VAT; ha e feta K5,000,000 o tla ba tlas'a income tax le VAT.

training_phrases: Gig economy e bewa mitelo buti?
Online le gig workers turnover tax?
responses: Annual turnover threshold ya turnover tax bakeng sa batho ba etsang kgwebo ka gig economy le yona e nyolohetse ku K5,000,000.

training_phrases: Ke mang a sa akarelwang mu turnover tax?
responses: Partnerships, income from consultancy services, mining operations le businesses tse ngodisitsweng ka voluntary VAT registration ga di akarelwa mu turnover tax.
Rental tax threshold e sa ntse e le K800,000, le threshold bakeng sa artisanal le small-scale mining licence holders e le K800,000.

training_phrases: Na tax clearance e hlokahala ka licences?
responses: TCC ke setlankane se se bontshang gore motho kana partnership e hlomphile ditlhokego tsa mitelo kana e dumellane le ZRA tlas'a melao ya mitelo, mme se hlokahala ho transfer property, ho fetola mong'a motor vehicle, ho fumana trading le mining licences le permits tsa mmuso tse fapaneng.

Professional bodies le ba regulator ba tshwanetse hape ho kopa TCC bakeng sa registration, renewal le practising licences, ntle le ha e le baithuti kapa batho ba sa etseng kgwebo e amanang le body eo.

training_phrases: Na ho na le ba lokolotsweng ho hloka TCC?
Ke mang a lokolotsweng ho tax clearance certificate?
responses: Eeh, TCC ga e hlokehe bakeng sa: Baithuti ba ngodisang ka regulatory institutions; bakopi ba sa etseng kgwebo e amanang le regulator; le supplies tsa goods le services tse ka tlase ho ZMW 200 ka transaction le agricultural produce ho fihla ho ZMW 10,000 ka transaction.

training_phrases: Apply Tax Clearance Certificate online buti?
responses: Kena mu ZRA web portal ka TPIN le password ya hao, ya ho Compliance kana Tax Clearance section, romela kopo ya TCC, mme ha e amohetswe o ka printa kapa download certificate ho tswa portal.

training_phrases: Advance Income Tax (AIT) ho remittances le exports ni yini?
AIT ho exports e bewa buti?
Na ke lefa tax ha ke romela chelete kantle?
Advance income tax ho foreign payments
responses: Ha taxpayer a sena TCC e valid, AIT ya 15% e bewa ho: Exports tsa goods bakeng sa kgwebo ka ports tsa ho kena; le foreign remittances tse fetang USD 2,000 (kapa kwacha equivalent) ka commercial bank.
AIT ke credit khahlanong le tax ya nako e tlang, e se final tax, mme e ka sebeliswa ho fokotsa ditlamo tse ding kapa ho refund-a ha go sena ditlamo.

training_phrases: Mobile Money Transaction Levy ni yini?
Ke mang ya lefang mobile money levy?
responses: Mobile Money Transaction Levy Act No. 25 ya 2024 e beha levy ho payment kapa transfer ya electronic money ho tswa ho motho a le mong ho ya ho yo mongwe, mme ZRA ke yone e e laolang.
Mobile money service providers ba tshwanetse ho bokela levy, ba romele returns, ba lefe levies ku ZRA ka nako, mme ba boloke direkoto tsa ts'ebetso, ho seng joalo ho na le dipenaliti.

training_phrases: Ke dife income tse taxable tlas'a PAYE?
responses: Pay As You Earn (PAYE) ke system ye employers ba fokotsang ka yona income tax go tswa ho emoluments ya basebetsi ho sebedisa monthly tax bands bakeng sa selemo sa tax.

Emoluments tse taxable di akarelwa salary ya khoeli, commutation ya accrued leave days le accrued service bonuses; empa pension benefits, redundancy pay le medical expenses tse duellwang ke employer di ka ba exempt.

training_phrases: Na ho na le tax credit bakeng sa batho ba nang le disability?
responses: Mošomi ya ngodisitsweng le Zambia Agency for Persons with Disabilities o na le tokelo ya disability tax credit ya K7,200 ka selemo, e lego K600 ka khoeli.
Employer o tshwanetse ho kenya credit ye ha a bala PAYE gore tax ya khoeli ya mošomi e fokotsege ka chelete yeo.

training_phrases: Na PAYE e feteletseng e ka refund-wa?
responses: Ka kakonyana PAYE ga e refund-we, empa refund e ka hlaha ha tax e beilwe go feta se swanetšego mu selemo sa tax, ka mabaka a jaaka diphoso tsa payroll, ho sebedisa tax bands tse fosahetseng, kapa ho beya tax ho income ye e swanetšego go ba exempt.

Refund e ka hlaha gape ha mošomi a tlogela tiro mu gare ga selemo kapa a dira deductions tse lokelang, tse kang donations ho approved Public Benefit Organisation, tlas'a limit ya 15 percent ya taxable income.

training_phrases: Property transfer tax rate 2025 ke bokae?
PTT rate ho mobu le shares?
responses: Ho tloha ka 1 January 2025, property transfer tax rate ke 8 percent ya realised value ho mobu, shares, intellectual property le mining rights bakeng sa exploration licences.
Mining rights tse dingwe, tse kang mining licences le mineral processing licences, di lefa PTT ya 10 percent ya realised value.

training_phrases: Reverse VAT ho imported services ni yini?
Na ke lefa VAT ha ke import-a services?
responses: Reverse VAT e sebetsa ha taxable supplier mu Zambia a reka taxable services ho supplier wa kantle ya tlang ka hare ho scope ya VAT, mme ke Zambian recipient ya tshwanetseng ho bala VAT sebakeng sa supplier wa kantle.
Importation ya exempt services ke taxable supplier, kapa importation ke motho ya etsang exempt supplies kana a sa hlokahale ho ngodisa VAT, ha e kene mu scope ya reverse VAT.

training_phrases: Ndi ka ikopanya buti le ZRA bakeng sa thuso?
Nka fumana thuso kae e nngwe?
Ke bolele le mang ka clarification?
responses: U ka letsetsa ZRA National Call Centre, wa etela Customer Experience Centre ya haufi kapa diofisi tse dingwe tsa ZRA, mme wa sebedisa website ya semmuso ho fumana dinomoro tsa phone, tshedimoso ya ditshebeletso le practice notes.
Practice note e gatelela gore dintlha tse rarahaneng kana di sa dumellaneng di loketse ho rarollwa ka ho ikopanya ka bonnete le ZRA, mme taxpayers ba ntse ba na le tokelo ya appeal ka taba tsa tax.
Moni, muli bwanji? Takulandirani ku Zambia Revenue Authority virtual assistant. Ndingakuthandizeni bwanji lero?
Takulandirani ku ZRA assistant. Funsani za kusintha kwa misonkho ya 2025, Smart Invoice, VAT kapena ntchito zina za ZRA.

Assistant iyi imapereka malangizo a m’kati pa kusintha kwa misonkho ku Zambia mu 2025, kuphatikiza income tax, VAT, zofunikira za Smart Invoice, turnover tax, mobile money levy ndi mitu ina yomwe ili mu Practice Note No. 1 ya 2025. Simalowa m'malo mwa malamulo kapena upangiri wovomerezeka wa ZRA.

training_phrases: Kodi Zambia Revenue Authority ndi chiyani?
responses: ZRA ndi bungwe la boma lomwe limayang'anira ndi kusonkhanitsa misonkho ndi ma levy osiyanasiyana ku Zambia, kuphatikiza income tax, VAT, customs ndi excise duties, komanso ma levy apadera monga mobile money transaction levy.
Mission ya ZRA ndi kukonza ndiponso kusunga bwino kusonkhanitsa misonkho ndi kayendetsedwe ka misonkho kuti Zambia ipite patsogolo.
Vision ya ZRA ndi kukhala chitsanzo chapamwamba padziko lonse pa kayendetsedwe ka misonkho ndi kulimbikitsa malonda.
Tagline ya ZRA ndi: "My Tax, Your Tax, Our Destiny".

training_phrases: Practice Note No. 1 ya 2025 ndi chiyani?
Malamulo ati ali mu practice note iyi?
Kodi kusintha kotani kufotokozedwa mu Practice Note 1 2025?
responses: Practice Note No. 1 ya 2025 imapereka malangizo a m'kati pa kusintha kosiyanasiyana kwa misonkho komwe kumayamba kugwira ntchito pa 1 January 2025.

Imaphimba kusintha mu: Income Tax Amendment Act No. 22 of 2024, Property Transfer Tax Amendment Act No. 27 of 2024, Value Added Tax Amendment Act No. 23 of 2024, VAT Regulations ndi Electronic Invoicing Regulations, Income Tax Advance Income Tax Regulations, kusintha kwa Customs ndi Excise, Insurance Premium Levy, ndi Mobile Money Transaction Levy Act No. 25 of 2024.
Practice note iyi ndi ya malangizo okha ndipo si malamulo enieni, ndipo siyimachotsa ufulu wa wowerengera kupempha kapena ufulu wa ZRA kugwiritsa ntchito kusankha kwawo mogwirizana ndi lamulo.

training_phrases: Kodi kusintha kwakukulu kwa misonkho kuyambira 1 January 2025 ndi kotani?
responses: Kusintha kwakukulu kuphatikiza: Turnover tax threshold yakwera kufika K5,000,000 ndipo mlingo wa 5% pa turnover yoposa K12,000 kufika pa malire amenewo. Property transfer tax yakwera kufika 8% pa malo, ma shares, intellectual property ndi exploration rights. Advance income tax ya 15% yaikidwa pa katundu wotumizidwa kunja ndi ndalama zomwe zikupita kunja popanda tax clearance certificate. VAT input tax tsopano imalumikizidwa makamaka ndi ma invoice a Smart Invoice kapena ma system omwe ZRA yawaloletsa kugwiritsa ntchito Smart Invoice.

training_phrases: Kodi ndimafunikira TPIN pa mobile money?
responses: TPIN ndi nambala yapadera yolembetsa msonkho ndipo tsopano ndi yofunika popereka ndi kusunga ma account ku makampani a madzi, mobile money ndi ma telecom, pa umembala wa ma professional bodies, komanso polembetsa ma title deeds a malo ndi ma transaction ena omwe amalamulidwa.

Mutha kulembetsa TPIN: Pa intaneti kudzera pa ZRA website. Kudzera mu TaxOnApp mobile application. Pogwiritsa ntchito USSD *858# pa ma network omwe amathandizidwa, kenako TPIN ndi ma credential anu zomveka zimatumikizidwa ku email ndi pa foni yanu.

training_phrases: Kodi ZRA e-invoicing system ndi chiyani?
responses: Smart Invoice ndi electronic invoicing system yomwe yafotokozedwa mu VAT framework yomwe imatulutsa ma tax invoice okhala ndi fiscal memory ndikutumiza data ku ZRA nthawi yomweyo, ndipo tsopano ikusintha ma invoice a pamanja ndi ma fiscal devices ena akale.

Kuyambira pa 1 January 2025, ma invoice omwe amavomerezedwa kwambiri pa VAT input tax ndi omwe atuluka mu Smart Invoice kapena kuchokera kwa taxable suppliers omwe ZRA yawaloletsa kuti asapange Smart Invoice.

training_phrases: Malamulo atsopano a Smart Invoice ayamba liti?
responses: Malamulo akulu a Smart Invoice ndi VAT omwe afotokozedwa mu Practice Note No. 1 ya 2025 ayamba kugwira ntchito pa 1 January 2025, tsiku lotsegulira malamulo atsopanowa.

training_phrases: Kodi ndingagwiritsenso ntchito ma invoice a pamanja pa input VAT?
Ma invoice akunja kwa Smart Invoice amalola input tax?
Ma invoice ati omwe angagwiritsidwe ntchito pa input tax claims?
Kodi ndimafunikira Smart Invoice kuti ndilandire VAT?
Kodi pali ma invoice osakhala a Smart Invoice omwe akadalipo pa input tax?
responses: Kwa ma supplies kuyambira 1 January 2025, input VAT nthawi zambiri imalipo kokha pa ma invoice opangidwa ndi Smart Invoice kapena ma invoice ochokera kwa taxable suppliers omwe ZRA yawaloletsa kupewa Smart Invoice; ma manual invoice ena sadzathandiza pa input tax claims.

Inde, ma tax invoice opangidwa osati kudzera mu Smart Invoice mpaka pa 31 December 2024 akadalipo ndipo angagwiritsidwe ntchito pa input VAT claims mu 2025 ngati akukwaniritsa nthawi ya masiku 90 komanso zofunikira zonse za tax invoice.

training_phrases: Ndili ndi nthawi yayitali bwanji yoti ndika-upload manual invoices?
Kodi chimachitika n’chiyani pakakhala kulephera kwa e-invoicing platform?
responses: Ngati Smart Invoice kapena invoicing system yovomerezeka yalephera, supplier amaloledwa kulemba ma transaction pamanja, koma ayenera ku-upload ma transaction onsewa ku electronic invoicing system mkati mwa maola 72 atangokonzedwa system.

training_phrases: Kodi ndani angaloledwe osagwiritsa ntchito Smart Invoice?
Kodi ZRA ingandilole osagwiritsa ntchito Smart Invoice?
Kodi ZRA ingaloletse bizinesi osagwiritsa ntchito Smart Invoice?
responses: Commissioner-General angaloletse taxable supplier kugwiritsa ntchito chikalata, chipangizo kapena equipment china chovomerezeka m'malo mwa Smart Invoice malinga ndi mikhalidwe yomwe yaikidwa, ndipo ma invoice opangidwa pansi pa exemption imeneyo akadalipo pa input tax purposes.

training_phrases: Kodi ndingasinthe approved invoicing system kupita ku bizinesi ina?
responses: Ayi, taxable supplier yemwe walembetsa approved invoicing system kuti agwiritse ntchito iye mwini sangasinthe system imeneyo kupita kwa taxable supplier wina.

training_phrases: Kodi Smart Invoice imakhudza bwanji insurance premium levy?
responses: Malamulo atsopano a Insurance Premium Levy asinthira mawu ochokera ku electronic fiscal devices kupita ku electronic invoicing systems, zomwe zikutanthauza kuti ma insurer, ma broker ndi ma agent ayenera kugwiritsa ntchito electronic invoicing system (monga Smart Invoice kapena yofanana) polemba insurance premiums ndi levy komanso potulutsa ma tax invoice.

training_phrases: Kodi Smart Invoice ikhudza ma VAT-registered suppliers onse?
Ndani ayenera kugwiritsa ntchito Smart Invoice?
responses: Inde, ma VAT-registered suppliers onse akuyembekezeka kutsatira Smart Invoice kapena system yofanana nawo kupatula ngati ZRA yawapatsa exemption; kulephera kugwiritsa ntchito system yomwe yalembedwa kungapangitse kuti ma invoice asavomerezedwe pa input tax ndipo kungabweretse chilango.

training_phrases: Kodi ndingapeze kuti technical support pa Smart Invoice?
responses: Practice Note No. 1 ya 2025 ikusonyeza ogwira ntchito za msonkho kuti agwiritse ntchito ma channel a pa intaneti a ZRA ndi ma contact a Smart Invoice support, komanso kulankhula ndi ZRA Call Centre kapena kukaona Customer Experience Centres kuti alandire thandizo.

training_phrases: Kodi VAT registration threshold ya 2025 ndi yotani?
responses: VAT registration threshold yokhazikitsidwa ndi lamulo ikadali K800,000 ya annual taxable turnover.
Ngati annual taxable turnover yanu imaposa K800,000, muyenera kulembetsa VAT molingana ndi malamulo ena okhazikitsidwa.

training_phrases: Turnover tax threshold ya 2025 ndi yotani?
responses: Kuyambira 2025, maximum annual threshold ya turnover tax yakwera kuchokera ku K800,000 kufika ku K5,000,000.
Kwa turnover pakati pa K12,000 ndi K5,000,000 pachaka, turnover tax rate ili pa 5 percent.

Wowerengera msonkho yemwe ali ndi annual taxable turnover yoposa K800,000 koma yosaposa K5,000,000 ayenera kulembetsa turnover tax ndi VAT, pamene opitirira K5,000,000 amakhala pansi pa income tax ndi VAT.

training_phrases: Nanga online ndi gig workers pa turnover tax?
responses: Annual turnover threshold ya turnover tax ya anthu omwe akuchita bizinesi kudzera mu gig economy nayo yakwera kufika ku K5,000,000.

training_phrases: Kodi ndani sakhudzidwa ndi turnover tax?
Kodi rental income imakhala turnover tax?
Kodi mining operations ali pa turnover tax?
responses: Ma partnership, income yochokera ku consultancy services, mining operations komanso mabizinesi omwe ali pa voluntary VAT registration sakuphatikizidwa mu turnover tax.
Rental tax threshold yakhalabe pa K800,000 ndipo threshold ya artisanal ndi small-scale mining licence holders nayonso ili pa K800,000.

training_phrases: Kodi tax clearance imafunika pa ma licence?
responses: TCC imatsimikizira kuti munthu kapena partnership yakwaniritsa zofunikira za misonkho kapena yachita mgwirizano ndi ZRA pansi pa malamulo oyendetsera misonkho, ndipo imafunika pa ma transaction monga kusamutsa katundu, kusintha mwini wa galimoto, kutenga ma trading ndi mining licences komanso ma permit ambiri a boma.

Ma professional bodies ndi ma regulator ena ayeneranso kufuna tax clearance certificate poti alembetse, akonzenso kapena kupereka practising licences, kupatula kwa ophunzira kapena omwe sali kuchita bizinesi yofanana ndi bungwe lawo.

training_phrases: Ndani exempt ku tax clearance certificate?
responses: Inde, TCC safunikira kwa: Ophunzira omwe akulembetsa ku ma regulatory institutions; ofunsira omwe sali kuchita bizinesi yofanana ndi regulator; komanso kupereka katundu ndi ntchito zomwe mtengo wake uli pansi pa ZMW 200 pa transaction komanso zokolola za ulimi mpaka ZMW 10,000 pa transaction.

training_phrases: Kodi ndingalembe bwanji Tax Clearance Certificate online?
responses: Lowani mu ZRA web portal pogwiritsa ntchito TPIN ndi password yanu, pitani ku gawo la Compliance kapena Tax Clearance, lembani pempho la TCC, ndipo likavomerezedwa mutha kusindikiza kapena kutsitsa certificateyo kuchokera mu portal.

training_phrases: Advance Income Tax (AIT) pa remittances ndi exports ndi chiyani?
Kodi AIT pa exports imalipidwa bwanji?
Kodi ndimalephera chiyani ndikamatumiza ndalama kunja?
Advance income tax pa malipiro akunja
responses: Ngati wowerengera alibe TCC yovomerezeka, AIT ya 15% imamangidwa pa: Katundu wotumizidwa kunja wa malonda pa port of entry, komanso pa foreign remittances zoposa USD 2,000 (kapena kofanana mu kwacha) kudzera mu commercial bank.
AIT imeneyi ndi credit yolipirira msonkho wa tsogolo, osati final tax, ndipo ingagwiritsidwe ntchito polipirira misonkho ina kapena kubweza ngati palibe msonkho wina wotsalira.

training_phrases: Mobile Money Transaction Levy ndi chiyani?
responses: Mobile Money Transaction Levy Act No. 25 of 2024 imakhazikitsa levy pa kulipira kapena kusamutsa electronic money kuchokera kwa munthu mmodzi kupita kwa wina, ndipo ZRA ndiye imayang'anira levy imeneyi.
Opereka ma service a mobile money ayenera kusonkhanitsa levy, kulemba ma returns, kupereka levy ku ZRA pa nthawi yake, ndikusunga ma record a ntchito zawo, ndipo pali chilango pakalephera kutero.

training_phrases: Kodi malipiro a ntchito amalipidwa bwanji msonkho mu 2025?
Ndalama ziti zomwe zimalipidwa msonkho pansi pa PAYE?
responses: Pay As You Earn (PAYE) ndi system yomwe a posita ntchito amachekera msonkho mu malipiro a antchito pogwiritsa ntchito ma monthly tax bands pachaka cha msonkho chilichonse.

Ndalama zomwe zimalipidwa msonkho zikuphatikiza malipiro a mwezi, commutation ya ma leave days omwe asungidwa, ndi ma bonuses a ntchito; pomwe ma payment ena monga ma pension benefits, redundancy pay ndi medical expenses operekedwa ndi employer angakhale exempt.

training_phrases: Kodi pali tax credit kwa anthu olumala?
responses: Wogwira ntchito yemwe walembetsedwa ndi Zambia Agency for Persons with Disabilities ali ndi ufulu wa disability tax credit ya K7,200 pachaka, yomwe ndi K600 pamwezi.
Employer ayenera kugwiritsa ntchito credit imeneyi pokuwerengera PAYE kuti msonkho wa mwezi wa wogwira ntchitoyo uchepe ndi kuchuluka kwa credityo.

training_phrases: Kodi PAYE yomwe yalipidwa mopitirira imatha kubwezedwa?
responses: Nthawi zambiri PAYE siimabwezedwa, koma refund ingachitike ngati msonkho walipidwa mopitirira mu chaka chimodzi cha msonkho, mwachitsanzo chifukwa cha zolakwa za payroll, kugwiritsa ntchito ma tax bands olakwika, kapena kulipira msonkho pa ndalama zomwe ziyenera kukhala exempt.

Refund imathanso kuchitika ngati wogwira ntchito wasiya ntchito pakati pa chaka kapena wachita ma deductions oyenerera monga zopereka ku Public Benefit Organisation yovomerezeka, motsatira malire a 15 percent ya taxable income.

training_phrases: Property transfer tax rate mu 2025 ndi yotani?
PTT rate pa malo ndi shares
responses: Kuyambira 1 January 2025, property transfer tax rate ili pa 8 percent ya realised value pa malo, ma shares, intellectual property ndi mining rights a exploration licences.
Mining rights ena monga mining licences ndi mineral processing licences amalipidwa PTT pa 10 percent ya realised value.

training_phrases: Reverse VAT pa imported services ndi chiyani?
Kodi ndimalipira VAT pa imported services?
responses: Reverse VAT imagwiritsidwa ntchito pamene taxable supplier ku Zambia walandira taxable services kuchokera ku supplier wakunja zomwe zili mu scope ya VAT, ndipo wolandira ku Zambia ndiye amasamalira VAT m'malo mwa supplier wakunja.
Kubwera kwa ma services a exempt ndi taxable supplier, kapena kubwera kwa munthu yemwe amapanga ma exempt supplies kapena yemwe safunika kulembetsa VAT, sizili mu scope ya reverse VAT.

training_phrases: Kodi ndingalumikizane bwanji ndi ZRA kuti ndithandizidwe?
Ndiyankhule ndi ndani kuti andifotokozere bwino?
responses: Mutha kulankhula ndi ZRA National Call Centre, kukaona Customer Experience Centre yapafupi kapena ma office ena a ZRA, komanso kugwiritsa ntchito website yovomerezeka kuti mupeze manambala a kulankhulirana, zambiri za ntchito ndi ma practice notes.
Practice note imalimbikitsa kuti mafunso ovuta kapena okangana ayende mwachindunji ndi ZRA, ndipo amalemekeza kuti wowerengera akadalibe ufulu wopempha pa nkhani za msonkho.
This question is beyond the scope of the current practice note. Please contact ZRA directly or consult the relevant tax legislation for a definitive position.
The assistant can only give general guidance. For a detailed or binding position, kindly engage ZRA or a qualified tax advisor.
Ichi funika lilelanda pa scope of current practice note. Funda ZRA directly na consult relevant tax legislation for definitive position.
Assistant ikupokela general guidance pe. For detailed na binding position, engage ZRA na qualified tax advisor.
Potso ye e feta moedi wa practice note ye. Ka kopo ikopanye ka ho toba le ZRA kapa o bone molao wa mitelo bakeng sa karabo e tiileng.
Assistant ye e fana fela ka manyalo ka kakaretso. Bakeng sa karabo e tlamehang, ikopanye le ZRA kapa tax advisor ya kwalifaiditsweng.
Funso limeneli lapitirira zomwe zili mu practice note ino. Chonde funsani ZRA mwachindunji kapena onani malamulo a msonkho oyenera kuti mupeze yankho lolondola.
Assistant iyi imangopereka malangizo a m'kati okha. Kuti mupeze yankho lolumikizidwa ndi lamulo, funsani ZRA kapena tax advisor wodziwitsa bwino.
